Description of incident: "A health care revenue company says one of its employees looked at nearly two dozen patient records without authorization.Cardon Outreach does contract work for AnMed Health, and has employees on site at the hospital. AnMed said in a release that a Cardon Outreach employee opened 22 patient files without authorization, including her own file.Cardon Outreach fired the employee immediately after learning of the breach, according to the release."More Information: http://www.wyff4.com/news/unauthorized-employee-accessed-hospital-patien...
